itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway welcome special guests authors of the "Tier One" thriller series Jeffrey Wilson and Brian Andrews as we discuss the success the difficulty of writing a hugely successful thriller series as co-authors, the b...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway welcome special guests authors of the "Tier One" thriller series Jeffrey Wilson and Brian Andrews as we discuss the success the difficulty of writing a hugely successful thriller series as co-authors, the benefit of military experience when writing military thrillers, why they never put the face of the lead character visible on the book cover, and why Jarred thinks climbing Mount Everest is stupid.

description:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway welcome special guests authors of the "Tier One" thriller series Jeffrey Wilson and Brian Andrews as we discuss the success the difficulty of writing a hugely successful thriller series as co-authors, the benefit of military experience when writing military thrillers, why they never put the face of the lead character visible on the book cover, and why Jarred thinks climbing Mount Everest is stupid.
